title: Malware types encountered during data compromise investigations 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Type Of Malware in the x axis and Share of encounters in the y axis.
Type Of Malware Downloader has the highest Share of encounters and Ransomware has the lowest Share of encounters.
There is a difference of 12.3 between the maximum Type Of Malware Downloader and minimum Type Of Malware Ransomware.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of encounters for 9 number of Type Of Malwares.
The Share of encounters is appeared to be the highest at Type Of Malware Downloader and lowest at Type Of Malware Ransomware.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Type Of Malware in the x axis and Share of encounters in the y axis.
Type Of Malware Downloader has the highest Share of encounters and Ransomware has the lowest Share of encounters.
There is a difference of 12.3 between the maximum Type Of Malware Downloader and minimum Type Of Malware Ransomware.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Type Of Malware in the x axis and Share of encounters in the y axis.
Type Of Malware Downloader has the highest Share of encounters and Ransomware has the lowest Share of encounters.
The Share of encounters of Type Of Malware Downloader is 18.57% larger than the minimum value at Ransomware.

The Type Of Malware Downloader has the highest Share of encounters, followed by Remote administration tool (RAT), and Memory scraper/dumper. Down to the Type Of Malware Ransomware which is the lowest.
Type Of Malware Webshell, and Memory scraper/dumper have a similar Share of encounters that is 8.0.
The Type Of Malware Downloader tends to be 2.18 percent higher than average.
The Share of encounters is 53.7 if we add up values of all Type Of Malwares.
